verbose_text: Anaerobic oxidation of methane supported a vital microbial community as demonstrated by 13 C-methane labeling experiments, rate measurements in vitro, rate estimations in situ, the presence of ANME related mcrA genes, and an active archaeal and bacterial community at stations 1 and 2.
evidence: methane supported a vital microbial community as demonstrated by  13 C-methane labeling experiments, rate measurements in vitro, rate estimations in situ, the presence of ANME-related mcrA
